Collect a bucket of well water

Carry water to the correct fourth horse's water bucket
Return to Éogar at Hengstacer Farm
Éogar can always use more help on his farm, and today he desperately needs help filling the horses' water buckets.

'Hey, you there! Do you have a free moment? I could use some help filling the water in the horses' buckets. The trick is, Billy, Bobby, Lizzie and Henry are finicky about who gets filled up first, as they have a bit of a pecking order. 

'They are a little funny about who gets attention first, so we need to be careful to do them in the right order. We can't upset them too much.

'If you spill too many buckets of water we'll have to cut you off from using the well for a while. We can't risk the well running dry, so we can't be too wasteful!'
